title: Article 2 - Family and Children's Services
content:
Article 2 - Family and Children's Services

State Regulations

Part 413 - Child Day Care Definitions, Enforcement and Hearings (§ 413.1 to 413.7)

Part 414 - School-age Child Care (§ 414.1 to 414.19)

Part 415 - Child Care Services (§ 415.0 to 415.17)

Part 416 - Group Family Day Care Homes (§ 416.0 to 416.20)

Part 417 - Family Day Care Homes (§ 417.1 to 417.20 to 417.21)

Part 418 - Day Care Centers (Subpart 418-1 to 418-2)

Part 419 - Special Day Care Services Program (§ 419.1 to 419.4 to 419.21)

Part 420 - STATE ADOPTION SERVICE (§ 420.1 to 420.5)

Part 421 - Standards of Practice for Adoption Services (§ 421.1 to 421.27)

Part 422 - Parental Support of Children Receiving Foster Care (§ 422.1 to 422.6 to 422.11)

Part 423 - Preventive Services Regulations (§ 423.1 to 423.7)

Part 424 - Adoptive Parent Registry (§ 424.1 to 424.5)

Part 425 - Day Services (§ 425.1 to 425.6)

Part 426 - Title Iv-e Foster Care, Adoption Assistance And Kinship Guardianship Assistance (§ 426.1 to 426.10)

Part 427 - STANDARDS OF PAYMENT FOR FOSTER CARE OF CHILDREN (§ 427.1 to 427.17 to 427.18)

Part 428 - STANDARDS FOR UNIFORM CASE RECORDS AND FAMILY AND CHILD ASSESSMENTS AND SERVICE PLANS (§ 428.1 to 428.15)

Part 429 - Family And Children's Services Plan (§ 429.1 to 429.5)

Part 430 - UTILIZATION REVIEW FOR FOSTER CARE AND PREVENTIVE SERVICES (§ 430.1 to 430.13)

Part 431 - Care and Protection of Children (§ 431.3 to 431.21)

Part 432 - Child Abuse And Maltreatment (§ 432.1 to 432.13)

Part 433 - Abuse, Neglect and Significant Incidents Involving Vulnerable Persons (§ 433.1 to 433.11)

Part 434 - Child Protective Services Administrative Hearing Procedure (§ 434.1 to 434.11)

Part 435 - Respite Care and Services for Families and Foster Families (§ 435.1 to 435.14)

Part 436 - Kinship Guardianship Assistance Program (§ 436.1 to 436.11)

Part 437 - Differential Response for Children Under 12 Years of Age (§ 437.1 to 437.5)

Part 438 - [Repealed]
Part 439 - QUALIFIED RESIDENTIAL TREATMENT PROGRAMS (§ 439.1 to 439.8)

Part 440 - PROGRAMS FOR YOUTH WHO HAVE BEEN OR ARE AT-RISK OF SEX TRAFFICKING (§ 440.1 to 440.6)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
